did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Maurice C. Burritt Director of Extension papers, 1919-1924.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence and other records of the Director of Extension at the New York State College of Agriculture.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and other records of the Director of Extension at the New York State College of Agriculture. Topics include services for farmers, fruit and vegetable growers, and homemakers; other New York State agricultural organizations; New York State counties; and reports on the current state of the New York State College of Agriculture and its extension program. Included is a photograph album illustrating the overcrowded conditions in the New York State College of Agriculture as of 1920.
